modName: Patch to fix arm animation issue of the BBP system of CHSBHC
summary: This is patch to fix arm animation issue of the BBP system of CHSBHC.
descriptionHtml:
[b]===== Content =====[/b]
This is patch to fix arm animation issue of the BBP system of CHSBHC 
that occurs when you use torch,shield and magic. 
I fixed defaultmale.hkx,defaultfemale.hkx.
I\'m not certain that my fix is correct.
You must backup save file before install.

I fixed skeleton.hkx and skeleton_female.hkx also,
but the skeleton.hkx and skeleton_female.hkx are not necessary for fixing bug.

[youtube]fxKZ_NUHRWM[/youtube]

[b]==== Release Note ====[/b]
1.5.0Beta:First Release
1.5.1Beta:Add Forgotten Fix to defaultmale.hkx.thanks xp32.

[b]==== Warning =====[/b]
This patch is related to defaultmale.hkx,defaultfemale.hkx files of skyrim v1.5.26.
If these files are updated by new version of skyrim, this mod will conflict against that.
If so, you must uninstall this patch.

[b]==== About conflict =====[/b]
this mod will conflict against the all mod that edit defaultmale.hkx and defaultfemale.hkx,
for example FNIS. but this patch contains FNIS Entry. 
So If you install this patch after FNIS, FNIS will work.

[b]==== How to install ====[/b]
Highly recommended to use NMM or BAIN.
or
unzip archive, then \"mesh\" folder put into your skyrim\\data folder.

[b]==== How to Uninstall ====[/b]
Highly recommended to use NMM or BAIN.
or
Remove files of this patch from skyrim\\data folder.

[b]==== File List ====[/b]
meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets\\skeleton.hkx
meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets female\\skeleton_female.hkx
meshes\\actors\\character\\characters\\defaultmale.hkx
meshes\\actors\\character\\characters female\\defaultfemale.hkx
